TopicTitle: Fighter Jets Mk1 and Mk2 (F-22 lookalikes)

Articles.Content:
Fighter Mk1 and Mk2

Its been a while since my last post. I haven't even played version KSP since about a week ago, and boy the new things are cool. The aerodynamics have changed, but you can still use my old method to make planes more maneuverable. With the new, cool looking parts, I have created a very simple fighter jet. I noticed though, that if you put more wings, it will be more maneuverable, but less fast. So I made two versions, one the is more of an acrobatic plane and one the is more a of speed and distance plane, but they both look identical. Although it was never my intent, the jet looks like the f-22. I used kerbpaint to paint the jet, and Environmental visual enhancements for the clouds, the craft is ALL stock parts. Without any more info, here they are:

[Full Album]

Downloads:

Mk1 (Speed)

Mk2 (Acrobatic)

Edited September 12, 2015 by manni01
Nice jet. Though I don't see a reassemble to the F22. I was an avionics maintainer for F22 during my time in the AirForce. Still I like it. Might create something similar for my fighter fleet.
Really really nice work. Smooth clipping all around. Very impressed.
